item.title: Buy this chemical manufacturer poised for a recovery, says Carter Worth
item.description: Chart analyst Carter Worth breaks down the improving technical outlook on this stock.

item.title: Bank of America initiates Paramount Skydance at underperform, says 'big picture is cloudy'
item.description: Analyst Jessica Ehrlich said the stock's risk/reward ratio appears unfavorable in the near term.

item.title: UBS upgrades ASML, says chipmaker is headed toward 'inflection point'
item.description: The firm lifted its rating on the Netherlands-based chipmaker to buy from neutral, partly given its renewed optimism on ASML's lithography business.

item.title: Broadcom is soaring after an earnings beat. What Wall Street analysts are saying
item.description: Broadcom's fiscal third-quarter report is being well-received by Wall Street analysts, several of whom lifted their price targets on the chipmaker.

item.title: Here are the AI stock charts that look good â€” and not so good, according to JPMorgan
item.description: JPMorgan offers up key technical levels it's watching on the biggest artificial intelligence stocks in the market.
